#summary Arduino libraries which can be used for other projects

= Arduino libraries =

ArduRCT uses a number of libraries. They have been developped to be as generic as possible. Each one provides a number of examples to better understand the usage of the library.

*[LCD_PCD8544]* [http://code.google.com/p/ardurct/downloads/list http://www.gstatic.com/codesite/ph/images/dl_arrow.gif]
<br>
A library to drive a Nokia 5110 graphical screen which uses the PCD8544 driver.<br>
Such a screen can be found at [http://www.sparkfun.com Sparkfun]  under sku: [http://www.sparkfun.com/products/10168 LCD-10168].
